system.description: You create powerful magic in some specially prepared object. The object contains the power to instantly transport its possessor across any distance within the same plane to your abode. You must give it willingly to a creature and inform it of a command word. To use it, the subject speaks the command word while rending or breaking the object (standard action); the individual and all objects worn and carried (up to heavy load) are instantly transported to your abode. You can alter the spell so that it transports you to within 10 feet of the possessor when the item is broken and the command word spoken.

components.materialDescription: The specially prepared object, whose construction requires gems worth 1,500 gp.
